name: Destiny of Marbles
description:
This project was made in MAGI (Master of Games, Animation and Interactivity) Game Jam at RMIT. It was made in 2 days with a fantastic team.

You shoot a pinball and create a story by hitting the obstacles you fall. In the end, you get a story article that describes the life story of childhood, adulthood and the elderly.

Controls:

  •  Spacebar (hold): To set the power of the ball.
  • Escape: Close Game.
  • R: Restart the Game.

Roles in the team:

  • Chenlin Zhang (Stan) > Concept and 2D Artist.
  • Khatim Javed Dar > Programmer and Designer.
  • Yi-Han Lin (Anna) > 3D Artist and 2D Artist.
  • Yuxuan Hu (Estella) > 3D Artist and Audio Designer.
